duties_responsibilities.duty: Monitor customer preferences, review operational records, and consult with division manager to plan advertising and secure information on customer specifications.
Prepare budgets, coordinate company-sponsored events, establish and maintain ongoing client relationships, and resolve customer disputes.
Communicate and promote services to clients/customers, participate in activities needed to support the management functions of the division, and represent the company at annual trade shows.
Participate in staff meetings and sales team meetings periodically.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Sales, or a related field (Master's preferred)
